MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the L18 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Pennyford Drive and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:52am. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 11:35am 29th January 2021
